caption.title: Detrended tree-ring width (TRW) chronologies developed for Uzbekistan (UZ) and Kyrgyzstan (KG), shown for the 20 th century.
caption.p: See Fig 1 for specific location of the sites and regions. Grey squares highlight the 1935–1964 and 1982–2011 periods used in the analyses.
